title: PMS 2.0 274 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, Week 6 NFL Recap, MNF Doubleheader Preview, AQ Shipley, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys overreact to everything that happened over the weekend in the NFL including the Bucs dominating the Packers, whether or not the Patriots stink, the Steelers and potentially the same old Brownies, and everything else from week 6 in the NFL. Joining Pat and AJ Hawk is friend of the program, 12 year NFL veteran and Center for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, AQ Shipley. Pat, AJ, and AQ chat about yesterday's game against the Packers, their week of practice leading up to the game and how they knew it was going to be a big game, his impression of the Bucs offense and Tom Brady so far, and his thoughts on that team moving forward this season (28:02-45:04). Next, Darius Butler joins the show to give a couple of locks for tonight's Monday Night Football games QB passing o/u's, his thoughts on the games this weekend, and who he's been impressed with thus far (52:36-1:08:16). Later, Pat and AJ give their thoughts on this weekend's games, how they think tomorrow's conversation with Aaron will go, they preview the Monday Night Football games, chat about and give their picks for the games (1:08:18-1:37:33). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we have reached 1 million subscribers and are giving away $100,000, and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
